name: REVIEW: Flying VIP Priority on VivaAerobus, Tijuana - Los Cabos
description:
Let's fly VivaAerobus, Mexico's cheap airline. With the average fare tracking a little below big competitor Volaris, and a rather hit and miss reputation... how did I find flying Viva? Stay tuned to find out how this ultra low cost airline performed when I flew between Tijuana and Los Cabos!

Global Peace Ambassadors 747SP story: https://simpleflying.com/tijuana-abandoned-boeing-747/amp/

0:00 Introduction
0:32 Tijuana Airport and CBX
3:18 Boarding
5:20 Taxi and takeoff
6:56 Cabin and seating
7:26 Fare breakdown and site issues!
8:39 Menu and onboard service
9:50 Route details
10:33 Landing, fare paid and conclusions

Aircraft: Airbus A320ceo
Flight Number: VIV 5044
Miles: 785
Airborne time: 1h45m
